results.content: Very informative and clear. There's a huge amount of information to take in at once but I'm still finding the course most enjoyable.
results.content_html: Very informative and clear. There's a huge amount of information to take in at once but I'm still finding the course most enjoyable.

results.content: There are little to no responses to conversations posted in the course.  It would have been nice to see a few more bootstrap features such as carousel/slide show explained.
results.content_html: There are little to no responses to conversations posted in the course. It would have been nice to see a few more bootstrap features such as carousel/slide show explained.

results.content: This course was an excellent way to begin bootstrap.  The instructor gave a very thorough explanation of not only how to use the features..but also why you would do certain things.  This was well worth it.  Thank you.
results.content_html: This course was an excellent way to begin bootstrap. The instructor gave a very thorough explanation of not only how to use the features..but also why you would do certain things. This was well worth it. Thank you.

results.content: Beginning of the course was good, I think buttons and glyphicons were over-explained and more focus could have been put on other topics.  I tried to figure out how to ask the instructor questions, and posted a question but no answers.
results.content_html: Beginning of the course was good, I think buttons and glyphicons were over-explained and more focus could have been put on other topics. I tried to figure out how to ask the instructor questions, and posted a question but no answers.

results.content: This is a fantastic course. The dialog and examples are east to follow. The course has excellent flow from one section to the next. The instructor is clear and to the point and is consistent through the course. This is a great course to get you very familiar with bootstrap.
